abstract: United States stocks are driven higher for third consecutive day, firmly cementing rebound from slump in wake of so-called Brexit.

headline.print_headline: Takeover News Drives Market Higher for 3rd Day
headline.main: Takeover News Drives the Market Higher

snippet: Many banks announced plans to raise dividends and buy back shares after a Federal Reserve announcement giving them clearance to do so....
lead_paragraph: Many banks announced plans to raise dividends and buy back shares after a Federal Reserve announcement giving them clearance to do so.
